response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to us, but its true worth lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate its unique features and capabilities fully. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this remarkable asset. Should you choose to accept, we will provide unparalleled support throughout the entire process to ensure a seamless transition and maximize your benefits from the product. Thank you for considering our offer, and I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your world.", "product_price": 750000}
